description: News, updates and information for the Bailiwick of Guernsey.
title: Guernsey news and updates: 23-27 November
title_page: Guernsey news and updates: 23-27 November - BBC News
maintext:
There is no need for families of returning students to restrict their movements if self-isolation procedures are being followed, Dr Nicola Brink has said.
The director of Public Health emphasised if a person is self-isolating in a shared home they should be doing so "completely separately from their family".
Dr Brink added that some people had contacted her to explain it was difficult for them to self-isolate and alternative accommodation or self-isolating together had been considered.
She said: "I don't think there's a halfway house here, you're either self-isolating separate from your family or else you need to self-isolate together."
